item.description:
For our first brunch in 2012 we'll go to DiParma Italian Table in Seekonk MA

This is a brunch buffet for $16 per person

Their website does not have a "public" brunch menu - there's a "function" brunch menu that is somewhat similar to what is offered on Sundays....  They will have such items as a carving station, omelette station, eggs benedict and several chafing dishes with hot foods such as chicken parm or stuffed shells.

http://diparmaitaliantable.com/DiParma_Italian_Table_Seekonk/Menu.html

Sounds delicious !

Thanks Heather for this restaurant suggestion !

Hope you can all make it to DiParma's.
item.how_to_find_us: I made a reservation in my name
item.name: January Brunch - DiParma Italian Table in Seekonk
